div.p: >>> A TV SHOW ON FX TONIGHT IS CALLED "THE BRIDGE."

THE REASON I’M MENTIONING IT IS BECAUSE IT DEALS WITH MEXICAN
CORRUPTION IN A FICTIONAL DRAMA. YOU MIGHT WANT TO CHECK IT OUT.
IF YOU’RE INTERESTED IN MEXICAN CORRUPTION, AND OF COURSE, WE
ARE HERE AT THE FACTOR. TIP OF THE DAY.
>>> AND THAT IS IT FOR US TONIGHT.
PLEASE CHECK OUT THE FOX NEWS FACTOR WEBSITE WHICH IS
